title: Steve B-day Stories, Questions, 01-17 Shout Outs, Sheryl Underwood, Big Dog Rapid Fire, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Steve B-day Stories, Questions, 01-17 Shout Outs, Sheryl Underwood, Big Dog Rapid Fire, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Birthday Steve Harvey!  We have many questions for The CEO.  Today the crew also gives shout outs to other celebrities that are sharing the same day as their birthday with Steve Harvey.  Sheryl Underwood stops by to talk to Big Dog and wish him well.  The Rapid Fire questions we have for Steve brings out the best answers for real.  Today in Closing Remarks, we have footage from when Steve introduced Christ and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
